name: @tnkshuuhei/foundry-template
description: Template repo for creating smart contracts with Hardhat and Foundry

scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:sol && pnpm run prettier:check
scripts.deploy:UUPS-sepolia: forge clean && forge script script/DeployUUPS.s.sol --rpc-url sepolia --broadcast --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_KEY --verify
scripts.upgrade: forge clean && forge script script/UpgradeUUPS.s.sol --rpc-url sepolia --broadcast --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_KEY --verify
